Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.search.grouping.TopGroups

  • Packages that use TopGroups 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.grouping
    This module enables search result grouping with Lucene, where hits with the same value in the specified single-valued group field are grouped together.

    • Uses of TopGroups in org.apache.lucene.search.grouping
